Thanks to Nintendo, you can now turn your “Super Money Shot Bros” fantasies into a reality. They are releasing development platforms that will allow anyone to create their own Wii games, and yes, they will even interface with those fancy remotes. Not only will you be able to make your own games, you will also be able to sell your creations via the Wii Shop Channel. The platform has been dubbed “WiiWare” and will be available sometime in early 2008.

Read more: Nintendo, Engadget & Joystiq
